english.segment1: Those who live up in the Heavens. And those who live down in the deepest place on earth. Will hear Your name. Will know Your fame. All creation will look up and know that
english.segment2: CHORUS: You, Only You. Can lead us to Your awesome majesty. Where we, we will be worshipping You only. It's You only
english.segment3: We have heard You in the fire. And we have followed You across the ocean floor. That's how it goes; The story grows. Two thousand years and still You're speaking
english.segment4: (CHORUS). You, Only You. Can lead us to Your awesome majesty. Where we, we will be worshipping You only. It's You only
english.segment5: You only. It's You only. You only. It's You only
english.segment6: BRIDGE: You came to free them. They condemned You. They nailed You up and tried to tear Your glory down. But to their shame Sunday came. They realized that even death can't hold You
english.segment7: (CHORUS). Only You. Can lead us to Your awesome majesty. Where we, we will be worshipping You only. It's You only
english.segment8: You only. It's You only. You only. It's You only. It's You only, yeah
